email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Daniel,

I hope this email finds you well. We are pleased to offer a freight rate for 12,000MT of wheat from Santos to Rotterdam under CIF terms. The vessel we propose is the OCEAN STAR, with a DWT of 75,000 and LOA of 220m. The laycan is set for October 10th to 15th, and the initial freight quote is USD 45.50 per MT.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 43.00 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day and the loading window?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
Daniel Kim
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Daniel,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 44.00 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 12,500 per day, and the loading window is 24 hours.

Please note that the laycan remains October 10th to 15th. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 44.00 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
Daniel Kim
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Daniel,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Santos on October 10th, with a 24-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
Daniel Kim
Global Charterers
